Reviews.Title: Hard to beat for the price. Nikon S3500 fits the bill.
Reviews.Author: clinton hullender
Reviews.Content: Extremely pleased with this Nikon bundle. Everything you need (plus some) to get started with digital photography. Takes wonderful pictures with an easy to use menu system. You dont have to be a computer guru to get great results with this package.

Reviews.Title: My Nikon
Reviews.Author: Terry Cover
Reviews.Content: when as old as I am , hands not real steady hands, pictures with this camera perfect. So easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: James Randolph
Reviews.Content: This Camera Takes great pictures. Easy to use and easy to set it up. By far the best camera I own.

Reviews.Title: Great package deal
Reviews.Author: Jeanette Keen
Reviews.Content: This was a Christmas gift for my granddaughter...she LOVED it.  What a nice bundle, now she has a better setup than I do!

Reviews.Title: EZ  nikon & great pix!
Reviews.Author: stavros
Reviews.Content: NOT happy with the "BUNDLE" items/need more info & a charger would be a winner! great Nikon great pix;TOO SLOOOOO faster shutter or?WHATS a READER DO?  thx  Stavros  call /e-mail info etc any substitions or????

Reviews.Title: Arrived as expected, with all accessories.
Reviews.Author: J. Gable
Reviews.Content: Arrived as expected, with all accessories. It's a gift so I can't speak to how well any of it works.

ProductInfo.Features:
20.1-MP CCD sensor for bright, sharp photos and HD videos
720p HD videos with sound bring your memories to life
Vibration Reduction helps keep the shot steady, even if your hands are not
7x optical zoom NIKKOR glass lens
Easily match your situation to one of 20 Scene Modes like Beach, Snow, Night Portrait, Sunset and more, and enjoy effortless great shots. Or, choose Scene Auto Selector and let the camera choose for you.
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon COOLPIX S3500 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver) + 16GB SDHC Memory Card+ Camera Case + Accessory Kit
